title: [K-12] Implicit Bias Awareness and Management Strategies for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of medicine and healthcare systems, with teaching experience
context.additional_context: Requirement for content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Identify and explain at least five implicit bias scenarios that may occur in medical settings
Apply three practical strategies to manage the impact of bias in clinical situations
Execute at least two reflective practice techniques to improve patient-physician relationships
Utilize a communication framework that facilitates bias discussions within medical teams

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
